original_text: Some seeds fell among thorn bushes. This is like people who hear the message from God. But they have many troubles in their minds. They want to get more money and more things. They think that this will make them happy. So they do not let God's message change them. They are like plants that do not grow well and make new seeds.
korean_text: 가시떨기에 뿌려졌다는 것은 말씀을 들으나 세상의 염려와 재물의 유혹에 말씀이 막혀 결실하지 못하는 자요

sentences.original_text: Some seeds fell among thorn bushes.
This is like people who hear the message from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님의 메시지를 듣는 사람들과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: But they have many troubles in their minds.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 마음속에 많은 염려를 가지고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: They want to get more money and more things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 많은 돈과 물건을 얻고 싶어 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They think that this will make them happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이것이 자신들을 행복하게 만들 것이라고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: So they do not let God's message change them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 하나님의 메시지가 자신들을 바꾸도록 내버려 두지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: They are like plants that do not grow well
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 잘 자라지 못하는 식물과 같습니다.
